price: ߒ ߣߌ߫ ߡߊ߬ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߣߍߡߊߕߌ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߕߏ߫ ߢߐ߲߮ ߠߊ߫ ߗߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߌ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߰ߘߌ߬ ߣߍ߲ߞߍ߫
arabic: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wadharnī wal-mukadhibīna ulī al-naʿmati wamahhil'hum qalīlan
